4200101：灵界阵魔法少女 1800/1000 光 魔法师 ①：这张卡不受对方的魔法卡的效果影响。 ②：这张卡攻击力·防御力上升自己墓地中永续魔法卡数量x100的数值。 ③：1回合1次，把场上1张永续魔法卡送去墓地，以场上的1张表侧表示的卡为对象才能发动。那张卡回到持有者卡组。 
--灵界阵的魔法少女
function c4200101.initial_effect(c)
	--immune spell
	local e1=Effect.CreateEffect(c)
	e1:SetType(EFFECT_TYPE_SINGLE)
	e1:SetCode(EFFECT_IMMUNE_EFFECT)
	e1:SetProperty(EFFECT_FLAG_SINGLE_RANGE)
	e1:SetRange(LOCATION_MZONE)
	e1:SetValue(c4200101.efilter)
	c:RegisterEffect(e1)
	--atkup
	local e2=Effect.CreateEffect(c)
	e2:SetType(EFFECT_TYPE_SINGLE)
	e2:SetProperty(EFFECT_FLAG_SINGLE_RANGE)
	e2:SetCode(EFFECT_UPDATE_ATTACK)
	e2:SetRange(LOCATION_MZONE)
	e2:SetValue(c4200101.val)
	c:RegisterEffect(e2)
	--defup
	local e3=e2:Clone()
	e3:SetCode(EFFECT_UPDATE_DEFENSE)
	c:RegisterEffect(e3)
	--destroy+to deck
	local e4=Effect.CreateEffect(c)
	e4:SetDescription(aux.Stringid(4200101,0))
	e4:SetCategory(CATEGORY_TODECK)
	e4:SetProperty(EFFECT_FLAG_CARD_TARGET)
	e4:SetType(EFFECT_TYPE_IGNITION)
	e4:SetRange(LOCATION_MZONE)
	e4:SetCountLimit(1)
	e4:SetCost(c4200101.cost)
	e4:SetTarget(c4200101.target)
	e4:SetOperation(c4200101.operation)
	c:RegisterEffect(e4)
end
function c4200101.efilter(e,te)
	return te:IsActiveType(TYPE_SPELL) and te:GetOwnerPlayer()~=e:GetHandlerPlayer()
end
function c4200101.atkfilter(c)
	return c:GetType()==TYPE_SPELL+TYPE_CONTINUOUS
end
function c4200101.val(e,c)
	return Duel.GetMatchingGroupCount(c4200101.atkfilter,c:GetControler(),LOCATION_GRAVE,0,nil)*100
end
function c4200101.cost(e,tp,eg,ep,ev,re,r,rp,chk)
	if chk==0 then return Duel.IsExistingMatchingCard(c4200101.atkfilter,tp,LOCATION_ONFIELD,LOCATION_ONFIELD,1,nil) end
	local g=Duel.SelectMatchingCard(tp,c4200101.atkfilter,tp,LOCATION_ONFIELD,LOCATION_ONFIELD,1,1,nil)
	Duel.SendtoGrave(g,REASON_COST)	
end
function c4200101.target(e,tp,eg,ep,ev,re,r,rp,chk,chkc)
	if chkc then return chkc:IsLocation(LOCATION_ONFIELD) and chkc:IsFaceup() end
	if chk==0 then return Duel.IsExistingTarget(Card.IsFaceup,tp,LOCATION_ONFIELD,LOCATION_ONFIELD,1,nil) end
	Duel.Hint(HINT_SELECTMSG,tp,HINTMSG_FACEUP)
	local g = Duel.SelectTarget(tp,Card.IsFaceup,tp,LOCATION_ONFIELD,LOCATION_ONFIELD,1,1,nil)
    Duel.SetOperationInfo(0,CATEGORY_TODECK,g,1,0,0)	
end
function c4200101.operation(e,tp,eg,ep,ev,re,r,rp)
	local tc=Duel.GetFirstTarget()
	if tc:IsRelateToEffect(e) then
		Duel.SendtoDeck(tc,nil,2,REASON_EFFECT)
	end
end
4200102：灵界阵诡计少女 1000/1800 暗 魔法师 ①：这张卡不受对方陷阱卡的效果影响。 ②：对方场上怪兽攻击力·防御力下降自己墓地中永续魔法卡数量x100点的数值。 ③：1回合1次，把场上1张永续魔法卡送去墓地，以场上的1张里侧表示的卡为对象才能发动。那张卡除外。 
--灵界阵的诡计少女
function c4200102.initial_effect(c)
	--immune trap
	local e1=Effect.CreateEffect(c)
	e1:SetType(EFFECT_TYPE_SINGLE)
	e1:SetCode(EFFECT_IMMUNE_EFFECT)
	e1:SetProperty(EFFECT_FLAG_SINGLE_RANGE)
	e1:SetRange(LOCATION_MZONE)
	e1:SetValue(c4200102.efilter)
	c:RegisterEffect(e1)
	--atk down
	local e2=Effect.CreateEffect(c)
	e2:SetType(EFFECT_TYPE_FIELD)
	e2:SetCode(EFFECT_UPDATE_ATTACK)
	e2:SetTargetRange(0,LOCATION_MZONE)
	e2:SetRange(LOCATION_MZONE)	
	e2:SetValue(c4200102.val)
	c:RegisterEffect(e2)
	--def down
	local e3=e2:Clone()
	e3:SetCode(EFFECT_UPDATE_DEFENSE)
	c:RegisterEffect(e3)
	--destroy+to deck
	local e4=Effect.CreateEffect(c)
	e4:SetDescription(aux.Stringid(4200102,0))
	e4:SetCategory(CATEGORY_REMOVE)
	e4:SetProperty(EFFECT_FLAG_CARD_TARGET)
	e4:SetType(EFFECT_TYPE_IGNITION)
	e4:SetRange(LOCATION_MZONE)
	e4:SetCountLimit(1)
    e4:SetCost(c4200102.cost)
	e4:SetTarget(c4200102.target)
	e4:SetOperation(c4200102.operation)
	c:RegisterEffect(e4)
end
function c4200102.efilter(e,te)
	return te:IsActiveType(TYPE_TRAP) and te:GetOwnerPlayer()~=e:GetHandlerPlayer()
end
function c4200102.atkfilter(c)
	return c:GetType()==TYPE_SPELL+TYPE_CONTINUOUS 
end
function c4200102.val(e,c)
    return Duel.GetMatchingGroupCount(c4200102.atkfilter,e:GetHandlerPlayer(),LOCATION_GRAVE,0,nil)*-100
end
function c4200102.cost(e,tp,eg,ep,ev,re,r,rp,chk)
	if chk==0 then return Duel.IsExistingMatchingCard(c4200102.atkfilter,tp,LOCATION_ONFIELD,LOCATION_ONFIELD,1,nil) end
	local g=Duel.SelectMatchingCard(tp,c4200102.atkfilter,tp,LOCATION_ONFIELD,LOCATION_ONFIELD,1,1,nil)
	Duel.SendtoGrave(g,REASON_COST)
end
function c4200102.rmfilter(c)
	return c:IsFacedown() and c:IsAbleToRemove()
end
function c4200102.target(e,tp,eg,ep,ev,re,r,rp,chk,chkc)
	if chkc then return chkc:IsLocation(LOCATION_ONFIELD) and chkc:IsFacedown() and chkc:IsAbleToRemove() end
	if chk==0 then return Duel.IsExistingTarget(c4200102.rmfilter,tp,LOCATION_ONFIELD,LOCATION_ONFIELD,1,nil) end
	Duel.Hint(HINT_SELECTMSG,tp,HINTMSG_FACEDOWN)
	local g = Duel.SelectTarget(tp,c4200102.rmfilter,tp,LOCATION_ONFIELD,LOCATION_ONFIELD,1,1,nil)
    Duel.SetOperationInfo(0,CATEGORY_REMOVE,g,1,0,0)
end
function c4200102.operation(e,tp,eg,ep,ev,re,r,rp)
	local tc=Duel.GetFirstTarget()
	if tc:IsRelateToEffect(e) then
        Duel.Remove(tc,POS_FACEUP,REASON_EFFECT)
	end
end
4200103：灵界阵的噗噗个噗 1250/1250 地 兽战士 这个卡名的②效果1回合只能使用1次。 ①：这张卡召唤成功时才能发动。从卡组选1张「灵界阵」的永续魔法卡在自己的魔法与陷阱区域表侧表示放置。 ②：1回合1次，把场上1张永续魔法卡送去墓地才能发动。自己卡组最上面的卡翻开给双方确认。 永续魔法卡的场合，那张卡送去墓地，从卡组抽1张卡。不是的场合，那张卡加入手卡。 ③：只要自己场上有「灵界阵」怪兽存在，并且这张卡在墓地存在的场合，双方场上怪兽攻击力·防御力上升100。 
--灵界阵的噗噗噗
function c4200103.initial_effect(c)
	--place
	local e1=Effect.CreateEffect(c)
	e1:SetDescription(aux.Stringid(4200103,0))
	e1:SetType(EFFECT_TYPE_SINGLE+EFFECT_TYPE_TRIGGER_O)
	e1:SetCode(EVENT_SUMMON_SUCCESS)
	e1:SetTarget(c4200103.tftg)
	e1:SetOperation(c4200103.tfop)
	c:RegisterEffect(e1)
	--draw
	local e2=Effect.CreateEffect(c)
	e2:SetDescription(aux.Stringid(4200103,1))
	e2:SetType(EFFECT_TYPE_IGNITION)
	e2:SetRange(LOCATION_MZONE)
	e2:SetCountLimit(1)
    e2:SetCost(c4200103.cost)
	e2:SetTarget(c4200103.target)
	e2:SetOperation(c4200103.operation)
	c:RegisterEffect(e2)	
	--atkup
	local e3=Effect.CreateEffect(c)
	e3:SetType(EFFECT_TYPE_FIELD)
	e3:SetCode(EFFECT_UPDATE_ATTACK)
	e3:SetRange(LOCATION_GRAVE)
	e3:SetTargetRange(LOCATION_MZONE,LOCATION_MZONE)
	e3:SetCondition(c4200103.spcon)
	e3:SetTarget(aux.TargetBoolFunction(Card.IsType,TYPE_MONSTER))
	e3:SetValue(100)
	c:RegisterEffect(e3)
	local e4=e3:Clone()
	e3:SetCode(EFFECT_UPDATE_DEFENSE)
	c:RegisterEffect(e4)
end
function c4200103.tffilter(c)
	return c:GetType()==TYPE_SPELL+TYPE_CONTINUOUS and c:IsSetCard(0x2aa) and not c:IsForbidden()
end
function c4200103.tftg(e,tp,eg,ep,ev,re,r,rp,chk)
	if chk==0 then return Duel.GetLocationCount(tp,LOCATION_SZONE)>0
		and Duel.IsExistingMatchingCard(c4200103.tffilter,tp,LOCATION_DECK,0,1,nil) end
end
function c4200103.tfop(e,tp,eg,ep,ev,re,r,rp)
	if Duel.GetLocationCount(tp,LOCATION_SZONE)<=0 then return end
	Duel.Hint(HINT_SELECTMSG,tp,HINTMSG_TOFIELD)
	local tc=Duel.SelectMatchingCard(tp,c4200103.tffilter,tp,LOCATION_DECK,0,1,1,nil):GetFirst()
	if tc then
		Duel.MoveToField(tc,tp,tp,LOCATION_SZONE,POS_FACEUP,true)
	end
end

function c4200103.sfilter(c)
	return c:GetType()==TYPE_SPELL+TYPE_CONTINUOUS 
end
function c4200103.cost(e,tp,eg,ep,ev,re,r,rp,chk)
	if chk==0 then return Duel.IsExistingMatchingCard(c4200103.sfilter,tp,LOCATION_ONFIELD,LOCATION_ONFIELD,1,nil) end
	local g=Duel.SelectMatchingCard(tp,c4200103.sfilter,tp,LOCATION_ONFIELD,LOCATION_ONFIELD,1,1,nil)
	Duel.SendtoGrave(g,REASON_COST)
end
function c4200103.target(e,tp,eg,ep,ev,re,r,rp,chk)
	if chk==0 then return Duel.IsPlayerCanDiscardDeck(tp,1) end
end
function c4200103.operation(e,tp,eg,ep,ev,re,r,rp)
	if not Duel.IsPlayerCanDiscardDeck(tp,1) then return end
	Duel.ConfirmDecktop(tp,1)
	local g=Duel.GetDecktopGroup(tp,1)	
	local tc=g:GetFirst()
	if tc:GetType()==TYPE_SPELL+TYPE_CONTINUOUS then	
		Duel.DisableShuffleCheck()
		Duel.SendtoGrave(tc,REASON_EFFECT)
		Duel.Draw(tp,1,REASON_EFFECT)
	else
		Duel.SendtoHand(tc,nil,REASON_EFFECT)
		Duel.ShuffleHand(tp)
	end		
end

function c4200103.cfilter(c)
	return c:IsFaceup() and c:IsSetCard(0x2aa) and c:IsType(TYPE_MONSTER)
end
function c4200103.spcon(e,c)
	return Duel.IsExistingMatchingCard(c4200103.cfilter,e:GetHandler():GetControler(),LOCATION_MZONE,0,1,nil)
end
4200104：灵界阵的搭档护卫兽 1000/1000 风 兽战士 ①：自己场上有表侧表示的永续魔法卡存在的场合才能发动。这张卡从手卡特殊召唤。 ②：只要自己场上有「灵界阵」怪兽存在，并且这张卡在墓地存在，双方场上的永续魔法卡不受除速攻魔法卡·永续魔法卡以外的卡的效果的影响。 
--灵界阵的搭档护卫兽
function c4200104.initial_effect(c)
	--special summon
	local e1=Effect.CreateEffect(c)
	e1:SetType(EFFECT_TYPE_FIELD)
	e1:SetCode(EFFECT_SPSUMMON_PROC)
	e1:SetProperty(EFFECT_FLAG_SPSUM_PARAM)
	e1:SetTargetRange(POS_FACEUP,0)
	e1:SetRange(LOCATION_HAND)
	e1:SetCondition(c4200104.spcon)
	c:RegisterEffect(e1)
	--grave emmmmm
	local e2=Effect.CreateEffect(c)
	e2:SetType(EFFECT_TYPE_FIELD)
	e2:SetCode(EFFECT_IMMUNE_EFFECT)
	e2:SetRange(LOCATION_GRAVE)
	e2:SetTargetRange(LOCATION_SZONE,LOCATION_SZONE)
	e2:SetCondition(c4200104.spcon2)
	e2:SetTarget(aux.TargetBoolFunction(Card.IsType,TYPE_SPELL+TYPE_CONTINUOUS))
	e2:SetValue(c4200104.efilter)
	c:RegisterEffect(e2)
end
function c4200104.filter(c)
	return c:GetType()==TYPE_SPELL+TYPE_CONTINUOUS
end
function c4200104.spcon(e,c)
	if c==nil then return true end
	return Duel.GetLocationCount(c:GetControler(),LOCATION_MZONE)>0 and
		Duel.IsExistingMatchingCard(c4200104.filter,c:GetControler(),LOCATION_SZONE,0,1,nil)
end
function c4200104.efilter(e,te)
    local tc = te:GetHandler()
	return not (tc:IsSetCard(0x2aa) or tc:GetType()==TYPE_SPELL+TYPE_CONTINUOUS or tc:GetType()==TYPE_SPELL+TYPE_QUICKPLAY) 
end
function c4200104.cfilter(c)
	return c:IsFaceup() and c:IsSetCard(0x2aa) and c:IsType(TYPE_MONSTER)
end
function c4200104.spcon2(e,c)
	return Duel.IsExistingMatchingCard(c4200104.cfilter,e:GetHandler():GetControler(),LOCATION_MZONE,0,1,nil)
end
4200105：灵界阵的契约宠物 1000/1000 水 兽战士 ①：自己场上有表侧表示的永续魔法卡存在的场合才能发动。这张卡从手卡特殊召唤。 ②：只要自己场上有「灵界阵」怪兽存在，并且这张卡在墓地存在， 双方墓地中的所有魔法卡全部视为永续魔法卡，并且不能用抽卡以外的方法从卡组或墓地将魔法卡加入手卡。 
--灵界阵的契约宠物
function c4200105.initial_effect(c)
	--special summon
	local e1=Effect.CreateEffect(c)
	e1:SetType(EFFECT_TYPE_FIELD)
	e1:SetCode(EFFECT_SPSUMMON_PROC)
	e1:SetProperty(EFFECT_FLAG_SPSUM_PARAM)
	e1:SetTargetRange(POS_FACEUP,0)

	e1:SetCondition(c4200105.spcon)

	--grave emmmmm
	local e2=Effect.CreateEffect(c)

	e2:SetRange(LOCATION_GRAVE)
	e2:SetTargetRange(LOCATION_GRAVE,LOCATION_GRAVE)
	e2:SetCondition(c4200105.spcon2)
	e2:SetTarget(aux.TargetBoolFunction(Card.IsType,TYPE_SPELL))
	e2:SetValue(TYPE_SPELL+TYPE_CONTINUOUS)
	c:RegisterEffect(e2)
	--disable search
	local e3=Effect.CreateEffect(c)
	e3:SetType(EFFECT_TYPE_FIELD)
	e3:SetCode(EFFECT_CANNOT_TO_HAND)
	e3:SetRange(LOCATION_GRAVE)
	e3:SetCondition(c4200105.spcon2)
	e3:SetTarget(aux.TargetBoolFunction(Card.IsType,TYPE_SPELL))

end
function c4200105.filter(c)
	return c:GetType()==TYPE_SPELL+TYPE_CONTINUOUS
end
function c4200105.spcon(e,c)
	if c==nil then return true end
	return Duel.GetLocationCount(c:GetControler(),LOCATION_MZONE)>0 and
		Duel.IsExistingMatchingCard(c4200105.filter,c:GetControler(),LOCATION_SZONE,0,1,nil)
end
function c4200105.cfilter(c)
	return c:IsFaceup() and c:IsSetCard(0x2aa) and c:IsType(TYPE_MONSTER)
end
function c4200105.spcon2(e,c)
	return Duel.IsExistingMatchingCard(c4200105.cfilter,e:GetHandler():GetControler(),LOCATION_MZONE,0,1,nil)
end
4200106：灵界阵的鬼神灰色骑士 link1 1600 ← 暗 战士 「灵界阵」怪兽1只 ①：这张卡的攻击力上升双方墓地中永续魔法卡数量×200点的数值。 ②：战斗阶段中，场上卡的效果发动时，把自己墓地中的1张永续魔法卡除外才能发动，那张卡的效果无效并破坏。 ③：这张卡战斗破坏对方怪兽时，以墓地中的把1张「灵界阵」的卡为对象才能发动。那张卡加入手卡。 
--灵界阵的鬼神灰色骑士
function c4200106.initial_effect(c)
	--link summon
	aux.AddLinkProcedure(c,aux.FilterBoolFunction(Card.IsLinkSetCard,0x2aa),1,1)
	c:EnableReviveLimit()
	--atkup
	local e1=Effect.CreateEffect(c)
	e1:SetType(EFFECT_TYPE_SINGLE)
	e1:SetProperty(EFFECT_FLAG_SINGLE_RANGE)
	e1:SetCode(EFFECT_UPDATE_ATTACK)
	e1:SetRange(LOCATION_MZONE)
	e1:SetValue(c4200106.val)
	c:RegisterEffect(e1)
	--negate
	local e2=Effect.CreateEffect(c)
	e2:SetCategory(CATEGORY_NEGATE+CATEGORY_REMOVE)
	e2:SetCode(EVENT_CHAINING)
	e2:SetType(EFFECT_TYPE_QUICK_O)
	e2:SetRange(LOCATION_MZONE)
	e2:SetProperty(EFFECT_FLAG_DAMAGE_STEP+EFFECT_FLAG_DAMAGE_CAL)
	e2:SetCondition(c4200106.negcon)
	e2:SetCost(c4200106.negcost)
	e2:SetTarget(c4200106.negtg)
	e2:SetOperation(c4200106.negop)
	c:RegisterEffect(e2)
	--tohand
	local e3=Effect.CreateEffect(c)
	--e3:SetDescription(aux.Stringid(92510265,1))
	e3:SetCategory(CATEGORY_TOHAND)
	e3:SetType(EFFECT_TYPE_SINGLE+EFFECT_TYPE_TRIGGER_O)
	e3:SetCode(EVENT_BATTLE_DESTROYING)
	e3:SetProperty(EFFECT_FLAG_CARD_TARGET)
	e3:SetCondition(aux.bdocon)
	e3:SetTarget(c4200106.thtg)
	e3:SetOperation(c4200106.thop)
	c:RegisterEffect(e3)
end
function c4200106.atkfilter(c)
	return c:GetType()==TYPE_SPELL+TYPE_CONTINUOUS
end
function c4200106.val(e,c)
	return Duel.GetMatchingGroupCount(c4200106.atkfilter,c:GetControler(),LOCATION_GRAVE,LOCATION_GRAVE,nil)*200
end

function c4200106.negcon(e,tp,eg,ep,ev,re,r,rp)
    local ph=Duel.GetCurrentPhase()
	return not e:GetHandler():IsStatus(STATUS_BATTLE_DESTROYED)
		and re:IsActiveType(TYPE_SPELL+TYPE_TRAP) and Duel.IsChainNegatable(ev)
		and ph>=PHASE_BATTLE_START and ph<=PHASE_BATTLE
end
function c4200106.sfilter(c)
	return c:GetType()==TYPE_SPELL+TYPE_CONTINUOUS
end
function c4200106.negcost(e,tp,eg,ep,ev,re,r,rp,chk)	
	if chk==0 then return Duel.IsExistingMatchingCard(c4200106.sfilter,tp,LOCATION_GRAVE,0,1,nil) end
	local g=Duel.SelectMatchingCard(tp,c4200106.sfilter,tp,LOCATION_GRAVE,0,1,1,nil)
	Duel.Remove(g,POS_FACEUP,REASON_COST)
end
function c4200106.negtg(e,tp,eg,ep,ev,re,r,rp,chk)
	if chk==0 then return re:GetHandler():IsAbleToRemove() end
	Duel.SetOperationInfo(0,CATEGORY_NEGATE,eg,1,0,0)
	if re:GetHandler():IsRelateToEffect(re) then
		Duel.SetOperationInfo(0,CATEGORY_REMOVE,eg,1,0,0)
	end
end
function c4200106.negop(e,tp,eg,ep,ev,re,r,rp)
	if Duel.NegateActivation(ev) and re:GetHandler():IsRelateToEffect(re) then
		Duel.Destroy(eg,REASON_EFFECT)
	end
end
function c4200106.thfilter(c)
	return c:IsSetCard(0x2aa) and c:IsAbleToHand()
end
function c4200106.thtg(e,tp,eg,ep,ev,re,r,rp,chk,chkc)
	if chkc then return chkc:IsControler(tp) and chkc:IsLocation(LOCATION_GRAVE) and c4200106.thfilter(chkc) end
	if chk==0 then return Duel.IsExistingTarget(c4200106.thfilter,tp,LOCATION_GRAVE,0,1,nil) end
	Duel.Hint(HINT_SELECTMSG,tp,HINTMSG_ATOHAND)
	local g=Duel.SelectTarget(tp,c4200106.thfilter,tp,LOCATION_GRAVE,0,1,1,nil)
	Duel.SetOperationInfo(0,CATEGORY_TOHAND,g,1,0,0)
end
function c4200106.thop(e,tp,eg,ep,ev,re,r,rp)
	local tc=Duel.GetFirstTarget()
	if tc:IsRelateToEffect(e) then
		Duel.SendtoHand(tc,nil,REASON_EFFECT)
	end
end
4200107：灵界阵的闪耀魔法少女 link1 1600 → 光 魔法师 「灵界阵」怪兽1只 ①：这张卡的攻击力上升双方场上表侧表示的永续魔法卡数量×300的数值。 ②：1回合最多2次，这张卡在进行战斗的场合，只在伤害计算结束时才能发动。把自己场上的1张永续魔法卡送去墓地，这张卡可以再次进行攻击宣言。这个效果在同一组连锁上只能发动1次。 
--灵界阵的闪耀魔法少女
function c4200107.initial_effect(c)
	--link summon
	aux.AddLinkProcedure(c,aux.FilterBoolFunction(Card.IsLinkSetCard,0x2aa),1,1)
	c:EnableReviveLimit()
	--atkup
	local e1=Effect.CreateEffect(c)
	e1:SetType(EFFECT_TYPE_SINGLE)
	e1:SetProperty(EFFECT_FLAG_SINGLE_RANGE)
	e1:SetCode(EFFECT_UPDATE_ATTACK)
	e1:SetRange(LOCATION_MZONE)
	e1:SetValue(c4200107.val)
	c:RegisterEffect(e1)
	--extra attack
	local e2=Effect.CreateEffect(c)
	e2:SetCategory(CATEGORY_NEGATE+CATEGORY_REMOVE)
	e2:SetCode(EVENT_BATTLED)
	e2:SetType(EFFECT_TYPE_QUICK_O)
	e2:SetCountLimit(2)
	e2:SetRange(LOCATION_MZONE)
	e2:SetCondition(c4200107.atkcon)
	e2:SetTarget(c4200107.atktg)
	e2:SetOperation(c4200107.atkop)
	c:RegisterEffect(e2)
end
function c4200107.atkfilter(c)
	return c:GetType()==TYPE_SPELL+TYPE_CONTINUOUS
end
function c4200107.val(e,c)
	return Duel.GetMatchingGroupCount(c4200107.atkfilter,c:GetControler(),LOCATION_ONFIELD,LOCATION_ONFIELD,nil)*300
end

function c4200107.atkcon(e,tp,eg,ep,ev,re,r,rp)
    local ph=Duel.GetCurrentPhase()
	return not e:GetHandler():IsStatus(STATUS_BATTLE_DESTROYED)
end
function c4200107.sfilter(c)
	return c:GetType()==TYPE_SPELL+TYPE_CONTINUOUS and c:IsAbleToGrave()
end
function c4200107.atktg(e,tp,eg,ep,ev,re,r,rp,chk)	
	if chk==0 then return Duel.GetAttacker()==e:GetHandler() 
	and Duel.IsExistingMatchingCard(c4200107.sfilter,tp,LOCATION_ONFIELD,0,1,nil) 
	and Duel.GetFlagEffect(tp,4200107)==0 end
	Duel.SetOperationInfo(0,CATEGORY_TOGRAVE,nil,1,tp,LOCATION_ONFIELD)	
	Duel.RegisterFlagEffect(tp,4200107,RESET_CHAIN,0,1)
end
function c4200107.atkop(e,tp,eg,ep,ev,re,r,rp)
	Duel.Hint(HINT_SELECTMSG,tp,HINTMSG_TOGRAVE)
	local g=Duel.SelectMatchingCard(tp,c4200107.sfilter,tp,LOCATION_ONFIELD,0,1,1,nil)
	if g:GetCount()==0 then return end
	Duel.SendtoGrave(g,REASON_EFFECT)
	local c=e:GetHandler()
	if c:IsRelateToEffect(e) then
		local e1=Effect.CreateEffect(e:GetHandler())
		e1:SetType(EFFECT_TYPE_SINGLE)
		e1:SetCode(EFFECT_EXTRA_ATTACK)
		e1:SetValue(Card.GetAttackedCount(c))
		e1:SetReset(RESET_EVENT+0x1fe0000+RESET_PHASE+PHASE_END)
		c:RegisterEffect(e1)
	end
end
4200108：灵界阵的威光大小姐 link1 1300 ↓ 炎 魔法师 「灵界阵」怪兽1只 ①：这张卡不会被战斗破坏，场上存在的这张卡不能解放。 ②：自己场上「灵界阵」怪兽攻击力·防御力上升自己墓地的「灵界阵」怪兽数量×100。 ③：只要这张卡存在在场上，场上怪兽获得以下效果。 ●这张卡用作融合·同调·超量·连接素材时，直到回合结束时效果无效化。 ●这张卡为融合·同调·超量·连接素材的怪兽攻击力上升200。这个效果不会被无效化。 
--灵界阵的威光大小姐
function c4200108.initial_effect(c)
	--link summon
	aux.AddLinkProcedure(c,aux.FilterBoolFunction(Card.IsLinkSetCard,0x2aa),1,1)
	c:EnableReviveLimit()
	--cannot release
	local e1=Effect.CreateEffect(c)
	e1:SetType(EFFECT_TYPE_SINGLE)
	e1:SetProperty(EFFECT_FLAG_SINGLE_RANGE)
	e1:SetRange(LOCATION_MZONE)
	e1:SetCode(EFFECT_UNRELEASABLE_SUM)
	e1:SetValue(1)
	c:RegisterEffect(e1)
	local e2=e1:Clone()
	e2:SetCode(EFFECT_UNRELEASABLE_NONSUM)
	c:RegisterEffect(e2)
	--boost
	local e3=Effect.CreateEffect(c)
	e3:SetType(EFFECT_TYPE_FIELD)
	e3:SetCode(EFFECT_UPDATE_ATTACK)
	e3:SetRange(LOCATION_MZONE)
	e3:SetTarget(aux.TargetBoolFunction(Card.IsSetCard,0x2aa))
	e3:SetTargetRange(LOCATION_MZONE,0)
	e3:SetValue(function(e,c) return Duel.GetMatchingGroupCount(function(c,e) return c:IsSetCard(0x2aa)and c:IsType(TYPE_MONSTER) end,c:GetControler(),LOCATION_GRAVE,0,nil)*100 end)
	c:RegisterEffect(e3)
	local e4=e3:Clone()
	e4:SetCode(EFFECT_UPDATE_DEFENSE)
	c:RegisterEffect(e4)
	--battle indestructable
	local e5=Effect.CreateEffect(c)
	e5:SetType(EFFECT_TYPE_SINGLE)
	e5:SetCode(EFFECT_INDESTRUCTABLE_BATTLE)
	e5:SetValue(1)
	c:RegisterEffect(e5)	
	--emmmm
	local e6=Effect.CreateEffect(c)
	e6:SetType(EFFECT_TYPE_SINGLE+EFFECT_TYPE_CONTINUOUS)
	e6:SetCode(EVENT_BE_PRE_MATERIAL)
	e6:SetRange(LOCATION_MZONE)
	e6:SetCondition(c4200108.mtcon)
	e6:SetOperation(c4200108.mtop)
	c:RegisterEffect(e6)
	--get effect
	local e7=Effect.CreateEffect(c)
	e7:SetType(EFFECT_TYPE_FIELD+EFFECT_TYPE_GRANT)
	e7:SetRange(LOCATION_MZONE)	
	e7:SetTargetRange(LOCATION_MZONE,LOCATION_MZONE)
	e7:SetTarget(c4200108.mttg)
	e7:SetLabelObject(e6)
	c:RegisterEffect(e7)
end
function c4200108.mttg(e,c)	
	return c:IsType(TYPE_MONSTER)
end
function c4200108.mtcon(c,tp)
	return (r==REASON_FUSION or r==REASON_SYNCHRO or REASON_XYZ or r==REASON_LINK)
end
function c4200108.mtop(e,tp,eg,ep,ev,re,r,rp)
	local c=e:GetHandler()
	local tc=c:GetReasonCard()
	local e1=Effect.CreateEffect(c)
	e1:SetType(EFFECT_TYPE_SINGLE)
	e1:SetCode(EFFECT_DISABLE)
	e1:SetReset(RESET_EVENT+0x1fe0000+RESET_PHASE+PHASE_END)
	c:RegisterEffect(e1)
	local e2=Effect.CreateEffect(c)
	e2:SetType(EFFECT_TYPE_SINGLE)
	e2:SetCode(EFFECT_UPDATE_ATTACK)
	e2:SetProperty(EFFECT_FLAG_CANNOT_DISABLE)
	e2:SetValue(200)
	e2:SetReset(RESET_EVENT+0x1fe0000)
	tc:RegisterEffect(e2)	
end
4200111：灵界阵的召唤魔术 永续魔法 ①：1回合1次，自己场上「灵界阵」怪兽特殊召唤成功时才能发动。从卡组把1张「灵界阵」的怪兽加入手卡。 ②：这张卡在墓地存在的场合，让这张卡回到持有者卡组才能发动。场上「灵界阵」怪兽的攻击力·防御力直到回合结束时上升500。 这个效果在对方回合也能发动。这个效果在自己场上有里侧表示的卡存在时不能发动。 
--灵界阵的召唤魔术
function c4200111.initial_effect(c)
	--Activate
	local e1=Effect.CreateEffect(c)
	e1:SetType(EFFECT_TYPE_ACTIVATE)
	e1:SetCode(EVENT_FREE_CHAIN)
	c:RegisterEffect(e1)
	--emmmm
	local e2=Effect.CreateEffect(c)
	e2:SetType(EFFECT_TYPE_FIELD+EFFECT_TYPE_QUICK_O)
	e2:SetCode(EVENT_SPSUMMON_SUCCESS)
	e2:SetCountLimit(1)
	e2:SetRange(LOCATION_SZONE)
	e2:SetTarget(c4200111.target)
	e2:SetOperation(c4200111.activate)
	c:RegisterEffect(e2)	
	--grave return
	local e3=Effect.CreateEffect(c)
	e3:SetCategory(CATEGORY_ATKCHANGE+CATEGORY_TODECK)
	e3:SetType(EFFECT_TYPE_QUICK_O)
	e3:SetCode(EVENT_FREE_CHAIN)
	e3:SetRange(LOCATION_GRAVE)
	e3:SetCondition(c4200111.thcon)
	e3:SetCost(c4200111.thcost)
	e3:SetTarget(c4200111.thtg)
	e3:SetOperation(c4200111.thop)
	c:RegisterEffect(e3)
end
function c4200111.filter(c,tp)
	return c:IsSetCard(0x2aa) and c:IsType(TYPE_MONSTER) and c:GetSummonPlayer()==tp 
end
function c4200111.filter2(c,e,tp)
	return c:IsSetCard(0x2aa) and c:IsType(TYPE_MONSTER) 
end

function c4200111.target(e,tp,eg,ep,ev,re,r,rp,chk)	
	if chk==0 then return eg:IsExists(c4200111.filter,1,nil,tp) end
	local g=eg:Filter(c4200112.filter2,nil,tp)
	Duel.SetTargetCard(eg)
end
function c4200111.activate(e,tp,eg,ep,ev,re,r,rp)
	Duel.Hint(HINT_SELECTMSG,tp,HINTMSG_ATOHAND)
	local g=Duel.SelectMatchingCard(tp,c4200111.filter2,tp,LOCATION_DECK,0,1,1,nil,e,tp)
	if g:GetCount()>0 then
		Duel.SendtoHand(g,nil,REASON_EFFECT)
		Duel.ConfirmCards(1-tp,g)
	end
end
function c4200111.thcost(e,tp,eg,ep,ev,re,r,rp,chk)
	if chk==0 then return e:GetHandler():IsAbleToRemoveAsCost() end
	Duel.Hint(HINT_SELECTMSG,tp,HINTMSG_REMOVE)
	Duel.SendtoDeck(e:GetHandler(),nil,2,REASON_COST)
end
function c4200111.thcon(e,tp,eg,ep,ev,re,r,rp)
    return not Duel.IsExistingMatchingCard(Card.IsFacedown,tp,LOCATION_ONFIELD,0,1,nil)
end
function c4200111.thtg(e,tp,eg,ep,ev,re,r,rp,chk,chkc)
	if chk==0 then return Duel.GetLocationCount(tp,LOCATION_MZONE)>0
		and Duel.IsExistingMatchingCard(c4200111.filter2,tp,LOCATION_DECK,0,1,nil,e,tp) end
	Duel.SetOperationInfo(0,CATEGORY_SPECIAL_SUMMON,nil,1,tp,LOCATION_DECK)
end
function c4200111.thop(e,tp,eg,ep,ev,re,r,rp)
	local g=Duel.GetMatchingGroup(c4200111.filter2,tp,LOCATION_MZONE,LOCATION_MZONE,nil)
	if g:GetCount()>0 then
		local sc=g:GetFirst()
		while sc do
			local e1=Effect.CreateEffect(e:GetHandler())
			e1:SetType(EFFECT_TYPE_SINGLE)
			e1:SetCode(EFFECT_UPDATE_ATTACK)
			e1:SetReset(RESET_EVENT+0x1fe0000+RESET_PHASE+PHASE_END)
			e1:SetValue(500)
			sc:RegisterEffect(e1)
			local e2=e1:Clone()
			e2:SetCode(EFFECT_UPDATE_DEFENSE)
			sc:RegisterEffect(e2)
			sc=g:GetNext()
		end
	end
end
4200112：灵界阵的契约魔术 永续魔法 ①：1回合1次，自己场上「灵界阵」怪兽特殊召唤成功时才能发动。直到回合结束时，那些怪兽不受除「灵界阵」卡以外的效果的影响。 ②：这张卡在墓地存在的场合，让这张卡回到持有者卡组才能发动。从卡组把1只「灵界阵」的怪兽特殊召唤。 这个效果在对方回合也能发动。这个效果在自己场上有里侧表示的卡存在时不能发动。 
--灵界阵的契约魔术
function c4200112.initial_effect(c)
	--Activate
	local e1=Effect.CreateEffect(c)
	e1:SetType(EFFECT_TYPE_ACTIVATE)
	e1:SetCode(EVENT_FREE_CHAIN)
	c:RegisterEffect(e1)
	--emmmm
	local e2=Effect.CreateEffect(c)
	e2:SetType(EFFECT_TYPE_FIELD+EFFECT_TYPE_QUICK_O)
	e2:SetCode(EVENT_SPSUMMON_SUCCESS)
	e2:SetCountLimit(1)
	e2:SetRange(LOCATION_SZONE)
	e2:SetTarget(c4200112.target)
	e2:SetOperation(c4200112.activate)
	c:RegisterEffect(e2)	
	--grave return
	local e3=Effect.CreateEffect(c)
	e3:SetCategory(CATEGORY_SPECIAL_SUMMON+CATEGORY_TODECK)
	e3:SetType(EFFECT_TYPE_QUICK_O)
	e3:SetCode(EVENT_FREE_CHAIN)
	e3:SetRange(LOCATION_GRAVE)
	e3:SetCondition(c4200112.thcon)
	e3:SetCost(c4200112.thcost)
	e3:SetTarget(c4200112.thtg)
	e3:SetOperation(c4200112.thop)
	c:RegisterEffect(e3)
end
function c4200112.condition(e,tp,eg,ep,ev,re,r,rp)
	return re:GetHandler():IsType(TYPE_SPELL) and Duel.IsChainNegatable(ev)
end
function c4200112.cfilter(c)
	return c:GetType()==TYPE_SPELL+TYPE_CONTINUOUS and c:IsDiscardable()
end
function c4200112.filter(c,e,tp)
	return c:IsSetCard(0x2aa) and c:IsType(TYPE_MONSTER) 
	and c:IsCanBeSpecialSummoned(e,0,tp,false,false)
end
function c4200112.filter2(c,tp)
	return c:IsSetCard(0x2aa) and c:IsType(TYPE_MONSTER) and c:GetSummonPlayer()==tp
end
function c4200112.efilter(e,te)
	return not te:GetHandler():IsSetCard(0x2aa)
end
function c4200112.target(e,tp,eg,ep,ev,re,r,rp,chk)	
	if chk==0 then return eg:IsExists(c4200112.filter2,1,nil,tp) end
	local g=eg:Filter(c4200112.filter2,nil,tp)
	Duel.SetTargetCard(eg)
end
function c4200112.activate(e,tp,eg,ep,ev,re,r,rp)
	local g=eg:Filter(c4200112.filter2,nil,e,tp)
	local dg=Group.CreateGroup()
	local c=e:GetHandler()
	local tc=g:GetFirst()
	while tc do
		local e1=Effect.CreateEffect(c)
		e1:SetType(EFFECT_TYPE_SINGLE)
		e1:SetProperty(EFFECT_FLAG_SINGLE_RANGE)
		e1:SetRange(LOCATION_MZONE)
		e1:SetCode(EFFECT_IMMUNE_EFFECT)
		e1:SetValue(c4200112.efilter)
		e1:SetReset(RESET_EVENT+0x1fe0000+RESET_PHASE+PHASE_END)
		tc:RegisterEffect(e1)	
		tc=g:GetNext()
	end	
end
function c4200112.thcost(e,tp,eg,ep,ev,re,r,rp,chk)
	if chk==0 then return e:GetHandler():IsAbleToRemoveAsCost() end
	Duel.Hint(HINT_SELECTMSG,tp,HINTMSG_REMOVE)
	Duel.SendtoDeck(e:GetHandler(),nil,2,REASON_COST)
end
function c4200112.thcon(e,tp,eg,ep,ev,re,r,rp)
    return not Duel.IsExistingMatchingCard(Card.IsFacedown,tp,LOCATION_ONFIELD,0,1,nil)
end
function c4200112.thtg(e,tp,eg,ep,ev,re,r,rp,chk,chkc)
	if chk==0 then return Duel.GetLocationCount(tp,LOCATION_MZONE)>0
		and Duel.IsExistingMatchingCard(c4200112.filter,tp,LOCATION_DECK,0,1,nil,e,tp) end
	Duel.SetOperationInfo(0,CATEGORY_SPECIAL_SUMMON,nil,1,tp,LOCATION_DECK)
end
function c4200112.thop(e,tp,eg,ep,ev,re,r,rp)
	if Duel.GetLocationCount(tp,LOCATION_MZONE)<=0 then return end
	Duel.Hint(HINT_SELECTMSG,tp,HINTMSG_SPSUMMON)
	local g=Duel.SelectMatchingCard(tp,c4200112.filter,tp,LOCATION_DECK,0,1,1,nil,e,tp)
	if g:GetCount()>0 then
		Duel.SpecialSummon(g,0,tp,tp,false,false,POS_FACEUP)
	end
end
4200113：灵界阵的虚无魔法 永续魔法卡 这个卡名的②效果1回合只能发动1次。 ①：只要这张卡存在在场上，双方除速攻魔法卡·永续魔法卡以外的魔法卡的效果不能发动并无效化。这张卡在发动后的第2个自己的准备阶段时，这张卡破坏。 ②：这张卡在墓地存在的场合，让这张卡回到卡组才能发动。从卡组抽1张卡。这个效果在自己场上有里侧表示的卡存在时不能发动。 
--灵界阵的虚无魔法
function c4200113.initial_effect(c)
	--Activate
	local e1=Effect.CreateEffect(c)
	e1:SetType(EFFECT_TYPE_ACTIVATE)
	e1:SetCode(EVENT_FREE_CHAIN)
	e1:SetTarget(c4200113.target)
	c:RegisterEffect(e1)
	--disable
	local e2=Effect.CreateEffect(c)
	e2:SetType(EFFECT_TYPE_FIELD)
	e2:SetCode(EFFECT_DISABLE)
	e2:SetRange(LOCATION_SZONE)
	e2:SetTargetRange(LOCATION_SZONE,LOCATION_SZONE)
	e2:SetTarget(c4200113.distarget)
	c:RegisterEffect(e2)
	--disable effect
	local e3=Effect.CreateEffect(c)
	e3:SetType(EFFECT_TYPE_FIELD+EFFECT_TYPE_CONTINUOUS)
	e3:SetCode(EVENT_CHAIN_SOLVING)
	e3:SetRange(LOCATION_SZONE)
	e3:SetOperation(c4200113.disoperation)
	c:RegisterEffect(e3)
	--cannot trigger
	local e4=Effect.CreateEffect(c)
	e4:SetType(EFFECT_TYPE_FIELD)
	e4:SetCode(EFFECT_CANNOT_TRIGGER)
	e4:SetProperty(EFFECT_FLAG_SET_AVAILABLE)
	e4:SetRange(LOCATION_SZONE)
	e4:SetTargetRange(0xa,0xa)
	e4:SetTarget(c4200113.distarget)
	c:RegisterEffect(e4)
	--grave return
	local e5=Effect.CreateEffect(c)
	e5:SetCategory(CATEGORY_DRAW+CATEGORY_TODECK)
	e5:SetType(EFFECT_TYPE_QUICK_O)
	e5:SetCode(EVENT_FREE_CHAIN)
	e5:SetRange(LOCATION_GRAVE)
	e5:SetCountLimit(1,4200113)
	e5:SetCost(c4200113.thcost)
	e5:SetTarget(c4200113.thtg)
	e5:SetOperation(c4200113.thop)
	c:RegisterEffect(e5)
end
function c4200113.target(e,tp,eg,ep,ev,re,r,rp,chk)
	if chk==0 then return true end
	local c=e:GetHandler()
	c:SetTurnCounter(0)
	--destroy
	local e1=Effect.CreateEffect(c)
	e1:SetType(EFFECT_TYPE_FIELD+EFFECT_TYPE_CONTINUOUS)
	e1:SetProperty(EFFECT_FLAG_CANNOT_DISABLE)
	e1:SetCode(EVENT_PHASE+PHASE_STANDBY)
	e1:SetCountLimit(1)
	e1:SetRange(LOCATION_SZONE)
	e1:SetCondition(c4200113.descon)
	e1:SetOperation(c4200113.desop)
	e1:SetReset(RESET_EVENT+0x1fe0000+RESET_PHASE+PHASE_STANDBY+RESET_SELF_TURN,2)
	c:RegisterEffect(e1)
end
function c4200113.descon(e,tp,eg,ep,ev,re,r,rp)
	return tp==Duel.GetTurnPlayer()
end
function c4200113.desop(e,tp,eg,ep,ev,re,r,rp)
	local c=e:GetHandler()
	local ct=c:GetTurnCounter()
	ct=ct+1
	c:SetTurnCounter(ct)
	if ct==2 then
		Duel.Destroy(c,REASON_EFFECT)
	end
end
function c4200113.distarget(e,c)
	return c~=e:GetHandler() and c:IsType(TYPE_SPELL) 
	    and not (c:GetType()==TYPE_SPELL+TYPE_CONTINUOUS or c:GetType()==TYPE_SPELL+TYPE_QUICKPLAY) 
end
function c4200113.disoperation(e,tp,eg,ep,ev,re,r,rp)
	local tl=Duel.GetChainInfo(ev,CHAININFO_TRIGGERING_LOCATION)
	local rc = re:GetHandler():GetType()
	if bit.band(tl,LOCATION_SZONE)~=0 and re:IsActiveType(TYPE_SPELL)
	and not (rc==TYPE_SPELL+TYPE_CONTINUOUS or rc==TYPE_SPELL+TYPE_QUICKPLAY) 
	then
		Duel.NegateEffect(ev)
	end
end
function c4200113.thcost(e,tp,eg,ep,ev,re,r,rp,chk)
	if chk==0 then return e:GetHandler():IsAbleToRemoveAsCost() end
	Duel.Hint(HINT_SELECTMSG,tp,HINTMSG_REMOVE)
	Duel.SendtoDeck(e:GetHandler(),nil,2,REASON_COST)
end
function c4200113.thtg(e,tp,eg,ep,ev,re,r,rp,chk,chkc)
	if chk==0 then return Duel.IsPlayerCanDraw(tp,1) end
	Duel.SetTargetPlayer(tp)
	Duel.SetTargetParam(1)
	Duel.SetOperationInfo(0,CATEGORY_DRAW,nil,0,tp,1)
end
function c4200113.thop(e,tp,eg,ep,ev,re,r,rp)
	local p,d=Duel.GetChainInfo(0,CHAININFO_TARGET_PLAYER,CHAININFO_TARGET_PARAM)
	Duel.Draw(p,d,REASON_EFFECT)
end
4200114：灵界阵的驱散魔法 永续魔法 ①：场上魔法卡发动时才能发动，从手卡把1张永续魔法卡送入墓地，那个效果无效并破坏。不能对应这个效果的发动发动魔法卡。 ②：这张卡在墓地存在的场合，让这张卡回到持有者卡组，以场上1张里侧表示的卡为对象才能发动。确认那张卡，是魔法卡就破坏，直到回合结束时无效。 不是魔法卡的场合，就回到持有者手卡。这个效果在自己场上有里侧表示的卡存在时不能发动。 
--灵界阵的驱散魔法
function c4200114.initial_effect(c)
	--Activate
	local e1=Effect.CreateEffect(c)
	e1:SetType(EFFECT_TYPE_ACTIVATE)
	e1:SetCode(EVENT_FREE_CHAIN)
	c:RegisterEffect(e1)
	--Activate(effect)
	local e2=Effect.CreateEffect(c)
	e2:SetCategory(CATEGORY_NEGATE+CATEGORY_DESTROY)
	e2:SetType(EFFECT_TYPE_FIELD+EFFECT_TYPE_QUICK_O)
	e2:SetCode(EVENT_CHAINING)
	e2:SetRange(LOCATION_SZONE)
	e2:SetCondition(c4200114.condition)
	e2:SetCost(c4200114.cost)
	e2:SetTarget(c4200114.target)
	e2:SetOperation(c4200114.activate)
	c:RegisterEffect(e2)
	--grave return
	local e3=Effect.CreateEffect(c)
	e3:SetCategory(CATEGORY_REMOVE+CATEGORY_TOHAND)
	e3:SetType(EFFECT_TYPE_QUICK_O)
	e3:SetCode(EVENT_FREE_CHAIN)
	e3:SetRange(LOCATION_GRAVE)
	e3:SetCondition(c4200114.thcon)
	e3:SetCost(c4200114.thcost)
	e3:SetTarget(c4200114.thtg)
	e3:SetOperation(c4200114.thop)
	c:RegisterEffect(e3)
end
function c4200114.condition(e,tp,eg,ep,ev,re,r,rp)
	return re:GetHandler():IsType(TYPE_SPELL) and Duel.IsChainNegatable(ev)
end
function c4200114.cfilter(c)
	return c:GetType()==TYPE_SPELL+TYPE_CONTINUOUS and c:IsDiscardable()
end
function c4200114.cost(e,tp,eg,ep,ev,re,r,rp,chk)
	if chk==0 then return Duel.IsExistingMatchingCard(c4200114.cfilter,tp,LOCATION_HAND,0,1,nil) end
	Duel.DiscardHand(tp,c4200114.cfilter,1,1,REASON_COST+REASON_DISCARD)
end
function c4200114.target(e,tp,eg,ep,ev,re,r,rp,chk)
	if chk==0 then return true end
	Duel.SetOperationInfo(0,CATEGORY_NEGATE,eg,1,0,0)
	if re:GetHandler():IsDestructable() and re:GetHandler():IsRelateToEffect(re) then
		Duel.SetOperationInfo(0,CATEGORY_DESTROY,eg,1,0,0)
		Duel.SetChainLimit(c4200114.chainlimit)
	end
end
function c4200114.chainlimit(e,rp,tp)
	return not e:GetHandler():IsType(TYPE_SPELL)
end
function c4200114.activate(e,tp,eg,ep,ev,re,r,rp)
	if Duel.NegateActivation(ev) and re:GetHandler():IsRelateToEffect(re) then
		Duel.Destroy(eg,REASON_EFFECT)
	end
end
function c4200114.thcost(e,tp,eg,ep,ev,re,r,rp,chk)
	if chk==0 then return e:GetHandler():IsAbleToRemoveAsCost() end
	Duel.Hint(HINT_SELECTMSG,tp,HINTMSG_REMOVE)
	Duel.SendtoDeck(e:GetHandler(),nil,2,REASON_COST)
end
function c4200114.filter(c)
	return c:IsFacedown()
end
function c4200114.thcon(e,tp,eg,ep,ev,re,r,rp)
    return not Duel.IsExistingMatchingCard(c4200114.filter,tp,LOCATION_ONFIELD,0,1,nil)
end
function c4200114.thtg(e,tp,eg,ep,ev,re,r,rp,chk,chkc)
	if chkc then return chkc:IsLocation(LOCATION_ONFIELD) and c4200114.filter(chkc) end
	if chk==0 then return Duel.IsExistingTarget(c4200114.filter,tp,LOCATION_ONFIELD,LOCATION_ONFIELD,1,e:GetHandler()) end
	Duel.Hint(HINT_SELECTMSG,tp,HINTMSG_DESTROY)
	local g=Duel.SelectTarget(tp,c4200114.filter,tp,LOCATION_ONFIELD,LOCATION_ONFIELD,1,1,e:GetHandler())
end
function c4200114.thop(e,tp,eg,ep,ev,re,r,rp)
    local c=e:GetHandler()
	local tc=Duel.GetFirstTarget()
	if tc:IsRelateToEffect(e) then
		if tc:IsFacedown() then Duel.ConfirmCards(tp,tc) end
		if tc:IsType(TYPE_SPELL) 
		    then 
		local e2=Effect.CreateEffect(c)
		e2:SetType(EFFECT_TYPE_SINGLE)
		e2:SetCode(EFFECT_DISABLE)
		e2:SetReset(RESET_PHASE+PHASE_END)
		tc:RegisterEffect(e2)
		local e3=Effect.CreateEffect(c)
		e3:SetType(EFFECT_TYPE_SINGLE)
		e3:SetCode(EFFECT_DISABLE_EFFECT)
		e3:SetValue(RESET_TURN_SET)
		e3:SetReset(RESET_PHASE+PHASE_END)
		tc:RegisterEffect(e3)
			Duel.Destroy(tc,REASON_EFFECT) 
		    else Duel.SendtoHand(tc,nil,REASON_EFFECT)
		end
	end
end

4200116：
4200117：灵界阵的试炼魔术【永续魔法】 这个卡名的①②效果1回合各能发动1次。 ①：自己的主要阶段时才能发动。从自己卡组上面把3张卡翻开。 翻开的卡中有「灵界阵」的卡的场合，根据那个数量获得以下效果。那之后，剩下的卡回到卡组。 ●1张以上：从那之中选1张「灵界阵」的卡送入墓地。 ●2张以上：从那之中选1张「灵界阵」的卡加入手卡。 ●3张：可以将场上这张卡以外的1张表侧表示的永续魔法卡送入墓地。 ②：这张卡在墓地存在的场合，让这张卡回到持有者卡组才能发动。从自己卡组上面把2张卡送去墓地。 这个效果在对方回合也能发动。这个效果在自己场上有里侧表示的卡存在时不能发动。 
--灵界阵的试炼魔术
function c4200117.initial_effect(c)
	--Activate
	local e1=Effect.CreateEffect(c)
	e1:SetType(EFFECT_TYPE_ACTIVATE)
	e1:SetCode(EVENT_FREE_CHAIN)
	c:RegisterEffect(e1)
	--Activate(effect)
	local e2=Effect.CreateEffect(c)
	e2:SetCategory(CATEGORY_DECKDES)
	e2:SetType(EFFECT_TYPE_IGNITION)
	e2:SetRange(LOCATION_SZONE)
	--e2:SetCountLimit(1) 
	e2:SetTarget(c4200117.target)--次数限制在这里
	e2:SetOperation(c4200117.activate)
	c:RegisterEffect(e2)	
	--grave return
	local e3=Effect.CreateEffect(c)
	e3:SetCategory(CATEGORY_TODECK+CATEGORY_DECKDES)
	e3:SetType(EFFECT_TYPE_QUICK_O)
	e3:SetCode(EVENT_FREE_CHAIN)
	e3:SetRange(LOCATION_GRAVE)
	--e3:SetCountLimit(1)
	e3:SetCost(c4200117.thcost)
	e3:SetTarget(c4200117.thtg)--次数限制在这里
	e3:SetOperation(c4200117.thop)
	c:RegisterEffect(e3)
end
function c4200117.cfilter(c)
	return c:GetType()==TYPE_SPELL+TYPE_CONTINUOUS and c:IsDiscardable()
end

function c4200117.target(e,tp,eg,ep,ev,re,r,rp,chk)
	if chk==0 then 
		if Duel.GetFieldGroupCount(tp,LOCATION_DECK,0)<3 then return false end
		local g=Duel.GetDecktopGroup(tp,3)
		local result=g:FilterCount(Card.IsAbleToHand,nil)>0
		local orgtime = Duel.GetFlagEffect(tp,4200107)
		local times = (tonumber(orgtime)==nil and {0} or {tonumber(orgtime)})[1]
		return result and bit.band(times,1)==0
	end
	if(bit.band((tonumber(orgtime)==nil and {0} or {tonumber(orgtime)})[1],1)==0) then
        Duel.RegisterFlagEffect(tp,4200107,RESET_PHASE+PHASE_END,0,1)
	end
	Duel.SetTargetPlayer(tp)
	Duel.SetOperationInfo(0,CATEGORY_TOHAND,nil,1,0,LOCATION_DECK)
	Duel.SetOperationInfo(0,CATEGORY_TOGRAVE,nil,1,0,LOCATION_DECK)	
end
function c4200117.activate(e,tp,eg,ep,ev,re,r,rp)
	local p=Duel.GetChainInfo(0,CHAININFO_TARGET_PLAYER)
	Duel.ConfirmDecktop(p,3)
	local g=Duel.GetDecktopGroup(p,3)
	if g:GetCount()>0 then
		Duel.Hint(HINT_SELECTMSG,p,HINTMSG_ATOHAND)		
		local sg=g:Filter(Card.IsSetCard,nil,0x2aa)
		local sgc = sg:GetCount()
		if sgc>0 then
			Duel.Hint(HINT_SELECTMSG,p,HINTMSG_TOGRAVE)	
		    local tc = sg:Select(p,1,1,nil)
		    if tc:GetFirst() then
			    Duel.ConfirmCards(1-p,tc)
			    Duel.SendtoGrave(tc,REASON_EFFECT)
				Group.RemoveCard(sg,tc:GetFirst())
	        end	
		end
		if sgc>1 then
		    Duel.Hint(HINT_SELECTMSG,p,HINTMSG_ATOHAND)	
		    local tc = sg:Select(p,1,1,nil)
		    if tc:GetFirst():IsAbleToHand() then
			    Duel.SendtoHand(tc,nil,REASON_EFFECT)
			    Duel.ConfirmCards(1-p,tc)
		        Duel.ShuffleHand(p)
	        else
		        Duel.SendtoGrave(sg,REASON_RULE)
	        end				
		end
		if sgc>2 then		
		    if Duel.IsExistingMatchingCard(function(c) return c:GetType()==TYPE_SPELL+TYPE_CONTINUOUS end,tp,LOCATION_ONFIELD,LOCATION_ONFIELD,1,e:GetHandler())
and Duel.SelectYesNo(tp,aux.Stringid(4200117,1))
			then			
				local tc =Duel.SelectMatchingCard(tp,function(c) return c:GetType()==TYPE_SPELL+TYPE_CONTINUOUS end,tp,LOCATION_ONFIELD,LOCATION_ONFIELD,1,1,e:GetHandler())
				if tc:GetFirst() then Duel.SendtoGrave(tc,REASON_EFFECT) end		
            end	    
		end
		Duel.ShuffleDeck(p)		
	end
end
function c4200117.thcost(e,tp,eg,ep,ev,re,r,rp,chk)
	if chk==0 then return e:GetHandler():IsAbleToRemoveAsCost() end
	Duel.Hint(HINT_SELECTMSG,tp,HINTMSG_REMOVE)
	Duel.SendtoDeck(e:GetHandler(),nil,2,REASON_COST)
end
function c4200117.thtg(e,tp,eg,ep,ev,re,r,rp,chk,chkc)
    local orgtime = Duel.GetFlagEffect(tp,4200107)
	local times = (tonumber(orgtime)==nil and {0} or {tonumber(orgtime)})[1]
	if chk==0 then return bit.band(times,2)==0 end
	if(bit.band((tonumber(orgtime)==nil and {0} or {tonumber(orgtime)})[1],2)==0) then
        Duel.RegisterFlagEffect(tp,4200107,RESET_PHASE+PHASE_END,0,1)
	    Duel.RegisterFlagEffect(tp,4200107,RESET_PHASE+PHASE_END,0,1)
	end
	Duel.SetOperationInfo(0,CATEGORY_DECKDES,nil,0,tp,2)
end
function c4200117.thop(e,tp,eg,ep,ev,re,r,rp)
	Duel.DiscardDeck(tp,2,REASON_EFFECT)
end
